text: Heliotropium socotranum is a species of plant in the family Boraginaceae. It is endemic to the island of Socotra. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Socotra socotranum Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Heliotropium socotranum
